file_content.text: I don't know about Lana anymore. I'm keeping an eye on her.
Watching Darth Marr pace. That guy redefines intense.
Bet you anything it's less tense out there than it is in here. All the same, watch yourself.
Watch out for those Massassi. They're no joke.
Keep it up. You'll have the Empire working with us yet.
Becoming less and less hostile around here. We'll get there.
You won't get Marr and Satele to hold hands, but your headway's bringing us closer to a working alliance.
Glad to have you handling this.
Revan won't have a chance to use that weapon. We won't let that happen.
The Imperial Guard... this just keeps getting better.
Just when we think it's all over....
